item.title: 自动化公司 Symbotic 签订 2 亿美元收购沃尔玛机器人部门的协议
item.description: Symbotic 周四表示，将以 2 亿美元现金收购沃尔玛的机器人业务，以帮助该零售商扩大自动化供应链，这使得这家仓库机器人公司的股价在盘前交易中上涨了 20%。【原文：Symbotic said on Thursday it would buy Walmart's robotics business for $200 million in cash to help expand the retailer's automated supply chain, sending shares of the warehouse robotics firm up 20% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 利息收入增长，雨天基金减少，PNC 财务公司利润上升
item.description: PNC Financial 周四公布第四季度利润增长，原因是该公司获得了更多的利息收入，并预留了更少的资本以应对潜在的贷款违约。【原文：PNC Financial on Thursday reported a higher fourth-quarter profit as it earned more in interest payments and set aside less capital to cover potential loan defaults.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利因投资银行业务复苏而利润大增
item.description: 摩根士丹利第四季度利润增长，主要得益于投资银行的交易热潮。【原文：Morgan Stanley's profit increased in the fourth quarter, fueled by a wave of dealmaking for the investment bank.】

item.title: 电动汽车需求疲软，竞争加剧，Polestar 预计盈利能力将推迟
item.description: Polestar 首席执行官表示，这家瑞典电动汽车制造商需要更长时间才能实现盈利，此前该公司报告称，2024 年的汽车销量低于预期，这使得该公司在美国上市的股票在盘前交易中下跌了约 8%。【原文：Polestar CEO said it would take longer for the Swedish EV maker to be profitable after the company reported it sold fewer cars in 2024 than it had projected, sending the company's U.S.-listed shares down about 8% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 美国银行利润因投资银行业务和交易业务增长而飙升
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America BAC.N）周四公布利润增长，原因是其投资银行家利用了第四季度交易复苏的机会，同时该银行预测 2025 年将获得更多的利息收入。【原文：Bank of America BAC.N reported higher profit on Thursday as its investment bankers capitalized on resurgence in dealmaking in the fourth quarter while the lender predicted it would earn more interest income in 2025.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Point72 的新人工智能基金收益率达到两位数，接近 15 亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，史蒂文-科恩（Steven Cohen）的 Point72 资产管理公司（Point72 Asset Management）以人工智能（AI）为重点的新基金在三个月前刚刚推出后就取得了 14% 的收益，基金规模增至近 15 亿美元。【原文：Steven Cohen's Point72 Asset Management's new artificial intelligence (AI)-focused fund posted a 14% gain after launching just three months ago, growing the fund to nearly $1.5 billion, according to sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 服装和玩具需求强劲，塔吉特上调假日销售展望
item.description: 受 11 月和 12 月服装、玩具和美容产品购物需求强劲的影响，塔吉特周四上调了假日季度可比销售额预期。【原文：Target raised its holiday-quarter comparable sales forecast on Thursday, buoyed by robust shopper demand for clothing, toys and beauty products during November and December.】

item.title: 消息人士称，凯雷为可能出售英国基金网络 Calastone 物色银行家
item.description: 四位熟知内情的人士称，凯雷已与银行家商讨出售其英国基金网络和数据业务 Calastone 的事宜，这将是该行业吸引了数十亿英镑投资者的最新一笔交易。【原文：Carlyle has lined up bankers to explore a sale of its British funds network and data business Calastone, which would be the latest deal in a sector that has attracted billions of pounds from investors, four people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 谷歌签署协议购买印度农场的碳减排信用额度
item.description: 谷歌（Google）周四表示，将购买印度一项计划的碳信用额度，该计划将大量农业废弃物转化为生物炭，生物炭是一种木炭，可以清除大气中的二氧化碳并将其返回土壤。【原文：Google will buy carbon credits from an Indian initiative that turns large amounts of agricultural waste into biochar - a form of charcoal that removes carbon dioxide from the atmosphere and returns it to the soil, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: TikTok 的禁令将如何生效--以及为什么用户不会使用变通办法
item.description: 中国字节跳动公司（ByteDance）旗下的社交媒体应用 TikTok 将于周日在美国被禁用，除非达成协议将其出售给美国投资者或美国最高法院进行干预。【原文：Social media app TikTok, which is owned by China's ByteDance, will be banned in the United States on Sunday unless a deal comes together to sell it to a U.S. investor or the U.S. Supreme Court intervenes.】

item.title: 国会共和党人警告说，美国债券收益率上升可能会打击特朗普的减税计划
item.description: 就在唐纳德-特朗普重新执政的前几天，他在美国国会的一些共和党盟友警告说，当选总统激进的减税议程可能会成为债券市场担忧迹象的牺牲品。【原文：Just days before Donald Trump returns to power, some of his Republican allies in the U.S. Congress are warning that the president-elect's aggressive tax-cut agenda could fall victim to signs of worry in the bond market.】

item.title: 独家报道美国联邦调查局（FBI）盯上华为老员工创办的中国科技公司
item.description: 消息来源和文件显示，美国商务部和联邦调查局都在调查一家鲜为人知的电信硬件公司，该公司十多年前由华为高级资深员工在中国创办，可能存在安全风险。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department and FBI are both investigating a little-known telecoms hardware firm founded by senior Huawei veterans in China more than a decade ago over possible security risks, sources and documents show.】

item.title: 早间竞价通胀缓解与银行盈利丰收
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国宣布向 12 个州的能源公用事业提供近 230 亿美元贷款
item.description: 美国能源部贷款办公室周四宣布为十几个州的几家能源公用事业公司提供 229.2 亿美元的有条件融资。【原文：The U.S. Energy Department's loan office on Thursday announced $22.92 billion in conditional financing for several energy utilities across a dozen states.】

item.title: 特朗普曾一度颠覆贸易，又将以新关税再次颠覆贸易
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普八年前来到华盛顿，发誓要改写美国的贸易关系，缩小巨大的货物贸易逆差，并通过新的关税重建美国的工业基础。【原文：Donald Trump came to Washington eight years ago vowing to rewrite U.S. trade relationships, shrink a massive goods trade deficit and rebuild America's industrial base with new tariffs.】

item.title: 投资者关注特朗普的经济政策，美元成为主宰
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普即将重返白宫，积极降息的希望逐渐破灭，这推动美元升至多年高位，投资者认为，在新政府支持增长和通胀政策的帮助下，美元将继续走强。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's imminent return to the White House and fading hopes for aggressive interest rate cuts have driven the dollar to multi-year highs, and investors see this strength continuing, aided by the new administration's pro-growth and inflationary policies.】

item.title: 联合健康（UnitedHealth）盈利超预期，医疗服务实力强劲
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）周四公布的第四季度利润超过分析师预期，原因是其医疗服务部门表现强劲，但季度销售额未达预期。【原文：UnitedHealth Group reported a fourth-quarter profit on Thursday that beat analysts' estimates due to strength in its health services unit, but missed estimates for quarterly sales.】

item.title: Codelco 提高 2024 年铜产量，但后期推进令工人吃紧，维护工作延迟
item.description: 铜生产商 Codelco 在去年年底大力推动在 2023 年将年产量从 25 年来的最低点略微提高，但工会工人和分析师表示，在该公司力争在本十年末将年产量提高到 170 万公吨的过程中，所采用的策略是不可持续的。【原文：Copper producer Codelco pushed hard at the end of last year to lift annual output slightly from a 25-year-low in 2023, but union workers and analysts said the tactics used were unsustainable as the company strives for annual production of 1.7 million metric tons by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 国际劳工组织称全球失业率将维持在 5%的历史最低水平附近
item.description: 国际劳工组织（International Labour Organization）在周四的一份报告中说，去年全球失业率稳定在5%的历史最低水平，并将在2025年继续保持这一水平。【原文：Global unemployment remained steady last year at an historical low of 5%, where it is set to stay in 2025, the International Labour Organization said in a report on Thursday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，股权出售谈判对中国嘀嗒出行的竞争对手小红书的估值为 200 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，中国小红书公司的支持者正寻求向腾讯等公司出售部分股权，这笔交易可能使 TikTok 竞争对手的估值至少达到 200 亿美元。【原文：Backers of China's Xiaohongshu are looking to sell a part of their stake to the likes of Tencent , among others, in a deal that could value the TikTok-rival at at least $20 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 在更多银行财报和经济数据公布之前，期货价格逐步上扬
item.description: 周四，在美国一些主要贷款机构发布季度财报和经济报告之前，美国股指期货震荡上扬，这些报告可能会对世界最大经济体的健康状况有所启示。【原文：U.S. stock index futures ticked up on Thursday, ahead of quarterly results from some of the country's major lenders, and economic reports that could offer insights into the health of the world's largest economy.】

item.title: 债券义警如何制衡特朗普的权力
item.description: 1993 年，当比尔-克林顿开始他的第一个总统任期时，他面临着一个意想不到的对手对他权威的挑战：债券交易商。【原文：When Bill Clinton began his first term as president in 1993, he faced a challenge to his authority from an unexpected adversary: bond traders.】

item.title: 美国宣布为下一代半导体先进封装提供 14 亿美元支持
item.description: 美国商务部周四宣布了 14 亿美元的最终奖励，用于支持下一代半导体先进封装。【原文：The U.S. Department of Commerce on Thursday announced $1.4 billion in final awards to support the next generation of semiconductor advanced packaging.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称其先进封装技术需求正在发生变化
item.description: 美国人工智能芯片巨头英伟达公司（Nvidia）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）周四在被问及该公司是否正在削减订单时表示，尽管英伟达所需的技术类型正在发生变化，但该公司对台积电（TSMC）先进封装的需求依然强劲。【原文：Nvidia's demand for advanced packaging from TSMC remains strong though the kind of technology it needs is changing, the U.S. AI chip giant's CEO Jensen Huang said on Thursday, after he was asked whether the company was cutting orders.】

item.title: 中国将调查美国对成熟节点芯片的补贴
item.description: 中国商务部周四表示，应中国成熟节点芯片产业的要求，中国将对美国政府对其半导体行业的补贴展开调查。【原文：China will launch investigations into U.S. government subsidies to its semiconductor sector at the request of China's mature node chip industry, the commerce ministry said on Thursday.】

item.title: 雷诺低成本品牌未来将增加更多电动汽车
item.description: 雷诺低成本品牌达契亚（Dacia）首席执行官丹尼斯-勒沃特（Denis Le Vot）周四表示，未来将增加更多的电动汽车，从2027年底的下一款Sandero开始。【原文：Renault's low-cost brand Dacia will add more electric vehicles in the future, starting with the next Sandero around the end of 2027, brand CEO Denis Le Vot said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国第二大基金管理公司首席执行官称计划进军美国和巴西市场
item.description: 中国第二大基金管理公司--华夏基金管理公司（China Asset Management Company）首席执行官表示，该公司计划今年在美国和巴西发行基金，押注投资者对中国市场兴趣的恢复。【原文：China Asset Management Company, the country's second-largest fund manager, plans to launch funds in the U.S. and Brazil this year, its chief executive said, betting on a revival of investor interest in Chinese markets.】

item.title: 中国对美国、欧盟、日本和台湾工业塑料征收临时关税
item.description: 中国周四表示，在长达数月的反倾销调查之后，将对从美国、欧盟、日本和台湾进口的工业塑料征收临时关税。【原文：China said on Thursday it would apply provisional duties on imports of industrial plastics from the United States, European Union, Japan and Taiwan after a months-long anti-dumping investigation.】

item.title: 亚洲对冲基金 2024 年业绩为 15 年来最佳
item.description: 去年，亚洲对冲基金利用市场的波动性、中国摇摆不定的经济中的赢家以及人工智能（AI）的机遇，取得了 15 年来最强劲的回报。【原文：Asian hedge funds delivered their strongest returns in 15 years last year, capitalising on market volatility, winners in China's wobbly economy and opportunities in artificial intelligence (AI).】

item.title: 吉博力首席执行官预计特朗普任期前美国建筑市场将保持稳定并略有增长
item.description: 瑞士冷热水管道产品制造商吉博力公司首席执行官克里斯蒂安-布尔（Christian Buhl）周四表示，预计今年美国建筑市场将保持稳定。【原文：Swiss plumbing products maker Geberit expects the construction market in the United States to be stable this year, Chief Executive Christian Buhl said on Thursday.】
